suggestions.rationale: Critical gap - no security prompt existed. Every project needs systematic security review for OWASP top 10 and common vulnerabilities.
Essential for session continuity. Context compaction loses nuance; handoffs preserve intent for another agent or future session.
Not every task needs deep-project-primer. Lightweight prompt for obvious single-file fixes without overhead.
Fills the empty 'communication' category. Universal need for PR descriptions, emails, and team messages.
Essential for debugging complex issues. Forces understanding of root cause by extracting minimal reproduction steps.
Supply chain security is critical. Audits for vulnerabilities, outdated packages, and unnecessary bloat.
